name: Machine!
description:
Use the machines and fulfill orders!

Gameplay tips:

  1. Use I and O to input and output cubes.
  2. Drag the cubes with the mouse. You can you can move multiple cubes by selecting them together.
  3. To interact with the machine, click the big green button.
  4. Recipes are generated randomly in each run.
  5. By hovering the cursor over the machine you can see its recipes.
  6. The Red zone is the output zone, the Green zone is the input zone, the Yellow zone is the fuel zone.
  7. If the car needs fuel, then it is written at the very bottom of the manual.

Tips:

  1. You can close several orders at once.
  2. The faster you close orders, the more points you will be given.
  3. Have fun.
